result.reason: No crash stack trace or reproduction steps provided — cannot determine root cause of crash when clicking 'More choices' in the RDP Windows Security credential dialog without knowing the exception type or Windows/mRemoteNG version.
result.approach: Obtain crash stack trace; likely an unhandled exception in the RDP ActiveX credential-picker flow (UIParentWindowHandle / IMsRdpClientNonScriptable3 interaction) — wrap the credential-dialog event path in a try/catch and check for cross-thread handle access
